description:
Ning Xingzhou is bound with a “healing system”, dedicated to conveying truth, goodness and beauty, and to influence villains from all walks of life.

Under his guidance, the apocalyptic bosses are dedicated to benevolence , the campus gangsters are admitted to the world’s prestigious schools, and the cultivator puts down the butcher knife to become a god…

Ning Xingzhou asked himself to play the role of a life mentor to the fullest, but…

Ning Xingzhou met those cold and paranoid eyes, he rubbed his sore lower back, wanting to cry without tears.

He obviously took the route of innocence and healing, how come all of them are blackened!

Before every villain went black, they walked through a rough road. The road was dark and they couldn’t see their fingers. They became panicked, gloomy, sick, and paranoid. Finally merged with the darkness.

But one day, there was a light in the darkness.

They went mad, crazy, and by fair means or foul just wanted to hold the light firmly in the palm of their hands and hold on to it till their deaths.

(I could have tolerated the darkness, if I had never seen the light.)>
